member.name: T:JetBrains.Build.Tools.XsdCs
member.summary: A task that produces a strongly-typed C# serialization classes file out of an XSD schema. We have to use a tool-task because the API is very poor.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Build.Tools.XsdCs.GenerateFullPathToTool
member.summary: Returns the fully qualified path to the executable file.
member.returns: The fully qualified path to the executable file.

member.name: P:JetBrains.Build.Tools.XsdCs.InputFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the input XSD file.

member.name: P:JetBrains.Build.Tools.XsdCs.Namespace
member.summary: Gets or sets the namespace for the generated classes.

member.name: P:JetBrains.Build.Tools.XsdCs.OutDir
member.summary: Gets or sets the output directory.
